markdownHelp.description_embed:
This guide will help you understand the markdown commands used in the channels of Alka Hub's statistics system. Follow the instructions carefully to properly configure your statistics!

Markdown:
- **Date**: Displays the date in a voice channel and updates based on the local time set during server configuration.
> {0}: Day
> {1}: Month
> {2}: Year
- **Hour**: Displays the time in a voice channel and updates based on the local time set during server configuration.
> {0}: Hours
> {1}: Minutes
- **Date / Hour**: Displays the date and time in a voice channel and updates based on the local time set during server configuration.
> {0}: Day
> {1}: Month
> {2}: Year
> {3}: Hours
> {4}: Minutes
- **Member Count**: Shows the total number of members on the Discord server.
> {0}: Member Count
- **Channel Count**: Shows the total number of channels on the Discord server.
> {0}: Channel Count
- **Bot Count**: Shows the total number of bots on the Discord server.
> {0}: Bot Count
- **Role Count**: Shows the total number of members with a specific role or multiple roles. (Roles must be configured in the channel permissions with the permission denied: **Read Message History**)
> {0}: Role Count
- **Role Count Online**: Shows the total number of online members with a specific role or multiple roles. (Roles must be configured in the channel permissions with the permission denied: **Read Message History**)
> {0}: Role Count
- **Status Bar**: Shows the number of users with status: online, do not disturb, or idle.
> {0}: Online
> {1}: Do Not Disturb
> {2}: Idle

Channels, along with their respective markdown (optional but at least one is necessary for channel creation), can contain emojis or other special characters.
